journal-title-group.journal-title: Quarterly Journal of Business and Economics

publisher.publisher-name: College of Business Administration of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln

title-group.article-title: The Expenditure Effects of Supply Side Tax Cuts: The Role of the Interest Elasticity of Money Demand

J.H.Beck, "An Analysis of Supply Side Tax Cuts in an IS-LM Model," National Tax Journal, Vol. 32, No. 4 (December, 1979), pp. 493-499.
A.S. Blinder, "Can Income Tax Increases Be Inflationary? An Expository Note," National Tax Journal, Vol. 26, No. 2 (June, 1973), pp. 295- 301.
CM.Gambs, "A Note on Macroeconomic Textbooks: The Use of the Aggregate Demand Curve," Journal of Economic Literature, Vol. 12, No. 3 (September, 1974), pp. 896-898.
---, "A Reply to Havrilesky and Purvis," Journal of Economic Literature, Vol. 13, No. 2 (June, 1975) p. 475.

D.D. Purvis, "A Comment on The Use of the Aggregate Demand Curve1," Journal of Economic Literature, Vol. 13, No. 2 (June, 1975), p. 474.
